slide.title: Cambodia Garment protest turns violent: Police stand guard as garment workers agitate for higher wages in front of a factory in Phnom Penh. Photo: AFP
Photos show garment workers clash with special forces. Photo: AFP
Human rights campaigners condemned the crackdown as the country's worst state violence against civilians in more than a decade.Photo: AFP
Garment workers clash with special forces. Photo: AFP
Security forces arrest protesters. Photo: AFP
Injured people are being taken to hospital. Photo: AFP
Cambodian police opened fire on protesting garment workers yesterday, killing at least three. Photo: AFP
